name: Curve Pong (Dawdle)
description:
> It's pong, but with dashing and curveballs

Curve Pong is a tron-style remix of pong, focused on fast gameplay and juice. The rules of normal pong still apply - however, the arena removes the floor and ceiling, stretching up and down into distant goals. The game is simple: get the ball to the other side, whether that means left/right or up/down. Add in a dash, a charge-shot, and curveballs, and… well, I think you get the picture ;3

Controls:
  • Escape to pause

Player 1 

  • A and D to move left and right 
  • Hold both at once to charge a stronger hit (alternatively, check settings to switch this to use S) 
  • Left shift to dash

Player 2 

  • J and L to move left and right 
  • Hold both at once to charge a stronger hit (alternatively, check settings to switch this to use K) 
  • Right shift to dash
